title: AI Guard Agent
bullets: Multi-modal intruder detection with facial recognition

title: Satellite Segmentation
bullets: Fine-tuned YOLOv8-based segmentation model for accurate solar panel detection in satellite imagery
Optimized U-Net (ResNet34 backbone) model to segment 7 key land cover classes from satellite images
Trained both models on custom datasets, generated overlay images, mask outputs, and GeoJSON files with real-world coordinates
Packaged both models into a deployable PyInstaller CLI tool, enabling segmentation via single command

title: URL Shortener with Analytics
bullets: Built scalable URL shortener with analytics tracking (clicks, referrers, geolocation)
Implemented rate limiting with Redis and MongoDB for link storage
Generated QR codes for each shortened URL using external API
Dockerized application for easy deployment and scaling

title: Intrusion Detection System
bullets: ML-based network anomaly detection with 95% accuracy
Analyzed 100K+ network packets for threat classification

title: 6-Stage RISC Processor
bullets: Designed pipelined RISC processor with hazard detection
Achieved 200MHz clock frequency on Spartan-6 FPGA
